description: Code Snippets Library for IT Engineers

snippets.title: Hello World
snippets.code: print("Hello, World!")

snippets.title: List Comprehension
snippets.code:
squares = [x**2 for x in range(10)]
even_squares = [x**2 for x in range(10) if x % 2 == 0]

snippets.title: Dictionary Comprehension
snippets.code:
square_dict = {x: x**2 for x in range(5)}
# Output: {0: 0, 1: 1, 2: 4, 3: 9, 4: 16}

snippets.title: Read File
snippets.description: Safe file reading with context manager
snippets.code:
with open('file.txt', 'r') as f:
    content = f.read()
    # or line by line:
    # lines = f.readlines()

snippets.title: API Request
snippets.code:
import requests

response = requests.get('https://api.example.com/data')
if response.status_code == 200:
    data = response.json()
    print(data)

snippets.title: Basic Class
Decorator
Async/Await
snippets.code:
import asyncio

async def fetch_data(url):
    await asyncio.sleep(1)  # Simulating API call
    return f"Data from {url}"

async def main():
    results = await asyncio.gather(
        fetch_data("url1"),
        fetch_data("url2"),
    )
    print(results)

asyncio.run(main())

snippets.title: Hello World
snippets.code: console.log('Hello, World!');

snippets.title: Arrow Functions
Destructuring
Spread Operator
Async/Await
Promise.all
ES6 Class
Array Methods
Basic SELECT
snippets.code:
SELECT id, name, email
FROM users
WHERE active = true
ORDER BY created_at DESC
LIMIT 10;

snippets.title: JOIN Tables
snippets.code:
SELECT u.name, o.order_date, o.total
FROM users u
INNER JOIN orders o ON u.id = o.user_id
WHERE o.status = 'completed'
ORDER BY o.order_date DESC;

snippets.title: LEFT JOIN
snippets.description: Include all records from left table
snippets.code:
SELECT u.name, COUNT(o.id) as order_count
FROM users u
LEFT JOIN orders o ON u.id = o.user_id
GROUP BY u.id, u.name;

snippets.title: Aggregation
snippets.code:
SELECT 
  category,
  COUNT(*) as product_count,
  AVG(price) as avg_price,
  SUM(quantity) as total_stock
FROM products
GROUP BY category
HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
ORDER BY total_stock DESC;

snippets.title: Subquery
snippets.code:
-- Find users with orders above average
SELECT name, email
FROM users
WHERE id IN (
  SELECT user_id
  FROM orders
  WHERE total > (SELECT AVG(total) FROM orders)
);

snippets.title: Common Table Expression (CTE)
snippets.code:
WITH high_value_customers AS (
  SELECT user_id, SUM(total) as total_spent
  FROM orders
  GROUP BY user_id
  HAVING SUM(total) > 1000
)
SELECT u.name, u.email, hvc.total_spent
FROM users u
INNER JOIN high_value_customers hvc ON u.id = hvc.user_id;

snippets.title: INSERT Data
snippets.code:
-- Single insert
INSERT INTO users (name, email, created_at)
VALUES ('Alice', 'alice@example.com', NOW());

-- Multiple insert
INSERT INTO products (name, price, category)
VALUES 
  ('Product A', 29.99, 'Electronics'),
  ('Product B', 49.99, 'Electronics');

snippets.title: UPDATE Data
snippets.code:
UPDATE users
SET 
  email = 'newemail@example.com',
  updated_at = NOW()
WHERE id = 1;

-- Update with JOIN
UPDATE products p
SET p.discount = 10
WHERE p.category_id IN (
  SELECT id FROM categories WHERE name = 'Sale'
);

snippets.title: Basic Commands
snippets.code:
# Navigation
cd ~/projects     # Change directory
pwd              # Print working directory
ls -la           # List files with details

# File operations
cp file.txt backup.txt
mv old.txt new.txt
rm -rf folder/   # Delete folder (careful!)
mkdir -p path/to/folder  # Create nested folders

snippets.title: Variables
snippets.code:
#!/bin/bash

NAME="Alice"
AGE=25
echo "Hello, $NAME! You are $AGE years old."

# Command substitution
CURRENT_DATE=$(date +%Y-%m-%d)
echo "Today is $CURRENT_DATE"

snippets.title: Conditionals
snippets.code:
#!/bin/bash

FILE="config.json"

if [ -f "$FILE" ]; then
  echo "File exists"
elif [ -d "$FILE" ]; then
  echo "It's a directory"
else
  echo "File not found"
fi

# String comparison
if [ "$NAME" = "Alice" ]; then
  echo "Hello Alice!"
fi

snippets.title: Loops
snippets.code:
#!/bin/bash

# For loop
for file in *.txt; do
  echo "Processing $file"
done

# C-style for loop
for ((i=0; i<5; i++)); do
  echo "Iteration $i"
done

# While loop
count=0
while [ $count -lt 5 ]; do
  echo "Count: $count"
  ((count++))
done

snippets.title: Functions
Pipes & Redirection
snippets.code:
# Pipe output to next command
cat file.txt | grep "error" | wc -l

# Find and count unique lines
cat log.txt | sort | uniq -c | sort -rn | head -10

# Redirect output
echo "Hello" > file.txt    # Overwrite
echo "World" >> file.txt   # Append

# Redirect stderr
command 2>&1 | tee output.log

snippets.title: Basic Workflow
snippets.code:
# Initialize repo
git init

# Stage changes
git add .                  # All files
git add file.txt           # Specific file

# Commit
git commit -m "feat: add new feature"

# Push to remote
git push origin main

snippets.title: Branching
snippets.code:
# Create and switch
git checkout -b feature/new-feature

# Or with newer syntax
git switch -c feature/new-feature

# List branches
git branch -a

# Delete branch
git branch -d feature/old-feature

# Delete remote branch
git push origin --delete feature/old-feature

snippets.title: Merge vs Rebase
snippets.code:
# Merge (creates merge commit)
git checkout main
git merge feature/new-feature

# Rebase (linear history)
git checkout feature/new-feature
git rebase main

# Interactive rebase (squash commits)
git rebase -i HEAD~3

snippets.title: Stash
snippets.code:
# Save current changes
git stash

# Save with message
git stash save "work in progress"

# List stashes
git stash list

# Apply and drop
git stash pop

# Apply specific stash
git stash apply stash@{0}

snippets.title: Undo Changes
snippets.code:
# Undo unstaged changes
git checkout -- file.txt

# Unstage file
git reset HEAD file.txt

# Undo last commit (keep changes)
git reset --soft HEAD~1

# Undo last commit (discard changes)
git reset --hard HEAD~1

# Revert commit (safe for shared history)
git revert <commit-hash>

snippets.title: Log & History
snippets.code:
# Simple log
git log --oneline

# With graph
git log --oneline --graph --all

# Last 5 commits
git log -5

# Show changes in commit
git show <commit-hash>

# Find who changed a line
git blame file.txt

snippets.title: Basic Commands
snippets.code:
# Pull image
docker pull nginx:latest

# Run container
docker run -d -p 8080:80 --name my-nginx nginx

# List containers
docker ps          # Running
docker ps -a       # All

# Stop/start/remove
docker stop my-nginx
docker start my-nginx
docker rm my-nginx

snippets.title: Dockerfile
snippets.code:
FROM python:3.11-slim

WORKDIR /app

# Install dependencies
COPY requirements.txt .
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt

# Copy application
COPY . .

# Expose port
EXPOSE 8000

# Run application
CMD ["python", "app.py"]

snippets.title: Docker Compose
snippets.code:
version: '3.8'

services:
  web:
    build: .
    ports:
      - "8000:8000"
    environment:
      - DATABASE_URL=postgres://user:pass@db:5432/mydb
    depends_on:
      - db

  db:
    image: postgres:15
    environment:
      - POSTGRES_USER=user
      - POSTGRES_PASSWORD=pass
      - POSTGRES_DB=mydb
    volumes:
      - postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data

volumes:
  postgres_data:

snippets.title: Debugging
snippets.code:
# Exec into running container
docker exec -it my-container /bin/bash

# View logs
docker logs my-container
docker logs -f my-container  # Follow

# Inspect container
docker inspect my-container

# View resource usage
docker stats
